parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering pump can cause the vehicle to sway and make it difficult to keep the steering wheel straight, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle sways or wanders while driving at high speeds
the steering wheel is difficult to keep straight
the steering feels loose or unstable.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering coupling shaft can cause the vehicle to sway and make it difficult to keep the steering wheel straight, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle sways or wanders while driving at high speeds
the steering wheel is difficult to keep straight
the steering feels loose or unstable.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A misadjusted steering gear can cause loose steering, making it difficult to control the vehicle and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The steering feels loose or unstable
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the steering wheel has excessive play.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the parking brake assembly can cause the parking brake to not release fully, which can lead to accidents or damage to the vehicle's brake system.
symptoms: The parking brake does not release fully
the parking brake light remains on even when the brake is released
the parking brake pedal feels stiff or difficult to press
the parking brake pedal does not return to its normal position.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Parking Brake Light Switch and Pedal Assembly Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the parking brake light switch and pedal assembly can cause the brake light to malfunction, leading to confusion or accidents.
symptoms: The brake light does not come on when the parking brake is engaged
the brake light remains on even when the parking brake is released
the parking brake pedal feels stiff or difficult to press
the parking brake pedal does not return to its normal position.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Misadjusted Bearing Hanger Shield and Emergency Brake Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The misadjusted bearing hanger shield rubbing on the drivetrain can cause a grinding noise, which can lead to premature wear on the drivetrain components, and potentially cause loss of control or accidents. The emergency brake being too tight can also cause the vehicle to pull to one side or vibrate, making it difficult to control.
symptoms: Grinding noise from the drivetrain
vibration while driving
pulling to one side
difficulty steering.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose front wheel bearings can cause the vehicle to wander or pull to one side, making it difficult to control, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Loose feeling in the steering
difficulty keeping the vehicle straight on the road
vibration while driving
uneven tire wear.
